Our chocolate collection

Every chocoholic's dream gift - the ultimate collection of PALETTI chocolate in every flavor. Sustainable cocoa production is vital for the future of manufacturing chocolate. 100 % of the cocoa we use comes from responsible sources.

Original packaging

For those who orders full palette of our tastes, chocolate bars will be packaged in a special designed little box for satisfying your most demanding gift requirements.

Express Next Day Delivery

Your parcel will be delivered within 1–2 working days of it leaving the Paletti warehouse. Once your parcel is packed and ready to leave our warehouse, you will receive a shipping confirmation email with a link to your shipment status. You can track your shipment online anytime.

History is our tradition

A love of fine chocolate has been inherent to us for nearly 100 years. For already three generations we have devoted ourselves to the chocolate and trade, to the fabrication of the finest tastes. Today, we are delivering our fine chocolate worldwide.

Yet, we never forget our roots. To be actively and wholeheartedly involved, to honor the old and, at the same time, dare to try the new – is our conviction and characterizes us as a family business. And I can give you my personal word of honor on this.

Frank Paletti
